patthana8.24:1.1_0: Nasaññojanañceva nasaññojanavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojano ceva nasaññojanavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.24:1.1_1: Nasaññojanañceva nasaññojanavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojanavippayutto ceva nanosaññojano ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.24:1.1_2: Nasaññojanañceva nasaññojanavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojano ceva nasaññojanavippayutto ca nasaññojanavippayutto
patthana8.24:1.1_3: ceva nano ca saññojano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.24:2.1_0: Nasaññojanavippayuttañceva nano ca saññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojanavippayutto ceva nano ca saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.24:2.1_1: Nasaññojanavippayuttañceva nano ca saññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojano ceva nasaññojanavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.24:2.1_2: Nasaññojanavippayuttañceva nano ca saññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojano ceva nasaññojanavippayutto
patthana8.24:2.1_3: ca nasaññojanavippayutto ceva nano ca saññojano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.24:3.1_0: Nasaññojanañceva nasaññojanavippayuttañca nasaññojanavippayuttañceva nano ca saññojanañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana8.24:3.1_1: nasaññojano ceva nasaññojanavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
